testcase.classname: As an administrator (admin) I should be able to delete the visitor puspose record in the system via API connection.
testcase.name: A DELETE request to the "/api/visitorsPurposeDelete" endpoint with valid authorization

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: * The api user sets "api/visitorsPurposeDelete" path parameters.............passed * The api user prepares a DELETE request to send to the api visitorsPurposeDelete add endpoint..undefined * The api user sends a DELETE request and saves the returned response.......skipped * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................skipped * The api user verifies that the "message" information in the response body is "Success"..skipped * The api user verifies that the Deletedid information is the same as the id information in the request body.skipped
